sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy says he is open to further dialogue with China after Beijing calls for peace talks and a ceasefire between Russia and Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy has expressed openness to talks with China following Beijing's calls for peace talks and a ceasefire between Russia and Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Beijing's 12-point document did not demand, however, the withdrawal of Russian troops from Ukrainian territory. Перш за все, я планую зустріти Сінь Зінпіна.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: І вважаю, що це буде на користь нашим державам і безпеці у світі.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Наскільки мені відомо, Китай поважає територіальну цілісність.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Історично поважає територіальну цілісність історично поважає територіальну цілісність, а значить повинна зробити все, щоб російська федерація вийшла з нашої території, бо в цьому і є повага суверенітету і територіальної цілісності.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: China stated at the United Nations that major countries bear a special and important responsibility in preventing a potential nuclear crisis.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Members of the G7 reaffirmed their commitment to Ukraine and the war of aggression it is fighting.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: All countries pledged to continue supporting Kyiv financially and with arms, while continuing on the path of sanctions against Moscow.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The German Chancellor, Olaf Scholz, has, er werde weitere Leopard-Tanker bieten.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Leider sehe ich auch nach einem Jahr Krieg und Blutvergießen keinerlei Bemühungen Russlands, diesen verbrecherischen Krieg zu beenden. Im Gegenteil.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Putin setzt weiter auf unverantwortliches nukleares Gebaren und stellt jetzt auch noch den letzten Abrüstungsvertrag zu strategischen Kernwaffen, den New START-Vertrag, mit den USA infrage.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Für seinen Teil hat US-Präsident Joe Biden mit China in Kuhl-Tensionen gesucht, indem er sagte, dass es keine Beweise gibt, dass Beijing Waffen an Russland bietet.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Beijing is providing weapons to Russia. Beijing has already denied it is providing or planning to supply the Russian army with weapons.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Around 10,000 people took to the streets to protest against Russia's invasion of Ukraine in Berlin on Friday, according to German police.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The demonstration ended at the famous Brandenburg Gate, which was illuminated in the blue and yellow colours of the Ukrainian flag.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Protesters also stopped at a destroyed Russian tank, which was installed outside the Russian embassy and symbolises the futility of war.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Demonstrators in solidarity with Ukraine also brought flags of other European countries, including Finland, Romania and the European Union.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The EU has agreed a new round of sanctions against Russia,

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: a decision deliberately timed to coincide with the one-year anniversary of the war in Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: It's the 10th package since President Vladimir Putin launched his invasion and introduces an export ban on industrial goods worth 11 billion euros.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The list includes electronic components, jet engines and antennas, which Moscow will struggle to replace.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: For the first time, the E.U. is also extending the sanctions to entities linked to Iran's Revolutionary Guard, targeting those involved in the production of drones that the Kremlin is using in Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The blacklist has finally been expanded to include individuals and entities that are responsible for illegal deportations of Ukrainian children.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The European Commission says that the pressure on Russia will continue.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The European Commission says that the pressure on Russia will continue.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Russia is falling backwards towards an autarkic economy, cut away from the world.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Our sanctions are eroding sharply its economic base, slashing any prospect to modernize it.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: We will continue to put pressure on Russia and on those supporting it on the battlefield.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: But the negotiations to reach the agreement on the 10th package of sanctions were not simple.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Some countries, including Poland, wanted more.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: They were asking for Russia's nuclear sector to be included, as well as a ban on synthetic rubber that is used in tire production.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The importation of Russian diamonds is also not on the list, something Belgium is opposed to.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: On the opposite side, Hungary was fighting to exclude several Russian names from the blacklist, but ultimately failed.
